attributes.action: ANN Widdecombe to become the SPEAKER
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Brown it is time now you listen to the Public.

The UK needs ANN WIDDECOMBE as the speaker 

if you agree sign please

rejection.details: The PM does not select the Speaker. This is a matter for Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
